bookmarks.description:
What is Amazon SES?

 

+ Amazon SES is cloud based email service for sending both transactional and mass emails.
+ SMTP is communication protocol for email transmission

+ AWS SDK and Email clients available

Why Amazon SES ?

 

+ Reasonable Cost

+ Competitive prices
+ First 62,000 of your monthly emails are FREE !!

+ $0.1 for 10k emails

+ High deliverable rate

 

 

+ DKIM - Domain Key Identified Mails - Email security standard (public key crypto to sign mails during transmission)

+ SPF - Sender Policy Framework - Allows email senders to whitelist which IP address are allowed to send the emails from

+ DMARC - Domain based Message Authentication Reporting & Conformance. uses SPF protocol

+ You can track all your sending activity

AWS SES Pros & Cons

 

Pros:
+ High availability and deliverability

+ No additional maintenance
+ Best Quality to price ratio

+ Comprehensive set of tools


Cons:
+ Complicated setup - lacking documentation

+ Good set of documentation

+ Initial limitations before verify your sending domains

+ Simple sending service - not marketing platform

+ Lack of template building
+ No email list storage

Alternatives

+ SendGrid
+ MailChimp
+ No A/B Testing, Detailed analytics
+ Mailgun
+ ClickSend
+ Peppy post

AWS SES Production Access Request?

 

Dear Team, 
My Official website is located here: https://soullyrics.net and overtime I have collected emails through opt-in subscriptions. My emails are clean and verified. I have been using other emails service providers like SendGrid for a long time and now I have planned to make a shift to Amazon SES. 

With earlier service providers like SendGrid, The website on daily basis sees around 75-100 transactional emails. We have a growing userbase with over 375 users currently now and seeing growth in the number of opt-in users and subscriptions I would like to move to AWS SES for Better price ratio and high delivery rate. 

I am using MailWizz software (https://www.mailwizz.com ) to maintain recipients lists, manage bounces, complaints and unsubsribe requests. This application can handle bounce, complaint and unsubscription effectively. The type of emails would be - transactional and subscription newsletter emails to my users. 

Kindly approve my request for Amazon SES production access in above specified region (N.Virginia us-east-1). 
Let me know if you have any questions. 

Thanks and Regards, 
Sincerely, 
pramodctci20@gmail.com
